candles.name: Soothing Lavender
candles.description: A calming lavender-scented candle, perfect for relaxation.

candles.name: Warm Vanilla Spice
candles.description: Indulge in the sweet and comforting aroma of warm vanilla with a hint of spice.

candles.description: Energize your space with the invigorating fragrance of citrus fruits.

candles.name: Cozy Fireside
candles.description: Experience the warmth and ambiance of a cozy fireside with this woodsy-scented candle.

candles.name: Ocean Breeze
candles.description: Bring the freshness of the ocean into your home with this breezy scented candle.
